testproblem.name: Stommel streamfunction tracer advection. Advect a passive scalar in a velocity field obtained from Stommel's streamfunciton, i.e. with a western boundary current which stretches the tracer field and makes the problem quite hard.

problem_definition.command_line: mpiexec fluidity -v3 Stommel2_A.flml > Stommel2_A.log 2>&1; mpiexec fluidity -v3 Stommel2_adapt-A.flml > Stommel2_adapt-A.log 2>&1;

from numpy import sqrt,pi,exp,sin,array,size,abs,max,amax,dot,zeros,reshape,transpose,arange import vtktools import scipy.integrate
def IC(X): from math import exp L = 1.e6 T = 10.0*exp(-((X[0] - 2.*L/3.)**2 + (X[1] - L/3.)**2)/(2.*(L/12.5)**2)) return T
def func(X, t): from math import exp, sin, cos ##L=1.e6; F=0.1; rho=1000.0; H=200.0; gamma=1.e-6; ##A = F*L/(pi*gamma*rho*H) A = 159154.94309189534 ##alpha = beta/gamma ##1/alpha = 100km=1e5; alpha = 1.e-5 ##beta=1e-11 ##zplus = -alpha/2 + sqrt((alpha**2)/4 + (pi/L)**2) zplus = 9.0504906000698326e-07 ##zminus = -alpha/2 - sqrt((alpha**2)/4 + (pi/L)**2) zminus = -1.0905049060006982e-05 ##p=(1-exp(L*zminus))/(exp(L*zplus)-exp(L*zminus)) p = 0.40451761482981791 ## q = 1-p q = 0.59548238517018204 ## pi/L = 3.1415926535897933e-06 ##psi = A*sin(3.1415926535897933e-06*y)*(p*exp(x*zplus) + q*exp(x*zminus) - 1.0) ## u = d psi/d y ## A*pi/L = 0.5 u = 0.5*cos(3.1415926535897933e-06*X[1])*(p*exp(X[0]*zplus) + q*exp(X[0]*zminus) - 1.0) ## v = -d psi/d x v = -A*sin(3.1415926535897933e-06*X[1])*(p*zplus*exp(X[0]*zplus) + q*zminus*exp(X[0]*zminus)) return [-u,-v] ## as we're going backwards
def function_analytical(x,y,t_start,t_end): from math import exp L = 1.e6 pos = scipy.integrate.odeint(func, [x, y], [t_start, t_end]) # print("Departure point:",pos[-1,:]) Analytical = 10.0*exp(-((pos[-1,0] - 2.*L/3.)**2 + (pos[-1,1] - L/3.)**2)/(2.*(L/12.5)**2)) # print("Analytical solution:",Analytical) return Analytical
def function_tetvol(X,Y,Z): X12 = X[1] - X[0]; X13 = X[2] - X[0]; X14 = X[3] - X[0] Y12 = Y[1] - Y[0]; Y13 = Y[2] - Y[0]; Y14 = Y[3] - Y[0] Z12 = Z[1] - Z[0]; Z13 = Z[2] - Z[0]; Z14 = Z[3] - Z[0] VOL = X12*( Y13*Z14 - Y14*Z13 ) + X13*( Y14*Z12 - Y12*Z14 ) + X14*( Y12*Z13 - Y13*Z12 ) return abs(VOL/6)
def function_trivol(X,Y): a = sqrt( (X[1] - X[0])**2 + (Y[1] - Y[0])**2) b = sqrt( (X[2] - X[0])**2 + (Y[2] - Y[0])**2) c = sqrt( (X[2] - X[1])**2 + (Y[2] - Y[1])**2) s = 0.5*(a+b+c) VOL = sqrt(s*(s-a)*(s-b)*(s-c)) return abs(VOL/2)
file = 'Stommel2_A_20.vtu' time = 1.e7 ug=vtktools.vtu(file) ug.GetFieldNames() n = ug.ugrid.GetNumberOfPoints()
temp=ug.GetScalarField('Temperature')
t_start = 0.0 t_end = float(time)
pos=ug.GetLocations() x=pos[:,0]; y=pos[:,1]; z=pos[:,2]
psi=zeros(size(x), float) for i in range(len(x)): # print("Arrival point,i:",x[i],y[i],i) psi[i] = function_analytical(x[i],y[i],t_start,t_end)
NE=ug.ugrid.GetNumberOfCells() ML=zeros(size(x), float) for ele in range(NE): ndglno=ug.GetCellPoints(ele) trivol=function_trivol(x[ndglno],y[ndglno]) for nod in ndglno: ML[nod] = ML[nod] + trivol/3
err = abs(psi - temp) norm1 = dot(ML,err) norm2 = dot(ML,err**2) snorm2 = sqrt(abs(norm2)) normaliseL2 = sqrt(abs(dot(ML,psi**2))) ##print(norm1) ##print(snorm2) ##print(amax(err)) print(n,snorm2/normaliseL2)
Fixed_error_norm = snorm2/normaliseL2
